alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 4:48AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern DeKalb, south central Cobb, east central Douglas, northwestern Clayton and southwestern Fulton Counties through 515 AM EST ... At 448 AM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Campbellton, or over City of South Fulton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, Decatur, City of South Fulton, East Point, Union City, Forest Park, College Park, Fairburn, Hapeville, Palmetto, North Atlanta, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Druid Hills, Candler-Mcafee, Sweet Auburn, and Piedmont Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EST for north central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton
